=== Current Issues ===

If you have the Atheros AR242x network adaptor and your using Ubuntu 8.10 you must install in the backports module and blacklist two modules:

sudo vi /etc/modprobe.d/blacklist

at the end of the file append:

blacklist ath_pci
blacklist ath_hal
